Articles.Content:
Hi, would anybody be willing to throw together a simple Retro Pack (the one that slots beneath the pod), Vernier Engine and Escape Tower that will work with the OMSK variants of the Redstone and Atlas.

I've just started using OMSK (FASA was too heavy for my laptop to cope) and these aren't included.

I did find a craft file on the web for one but it uses Sepratrons and other components that aren't available until later in the tech tree - by which time I've usually started using the Mk 1-2 pod.

Much appreciated.

Paul
